name: Camtasia Package
summary: A CAMPACKAGE file is a package of video resources created by TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing application. It stores one or more resources Camtasia users utilize to enhance a video, such as templates, themes, libraries, presets, and shortcuts. The primary purpose of CAMPACKAGE files is to back up or share resources with other Camtasia users.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
